amendment.description: Amendment to increase and then decrease funds within the Veterans Benefits Administration Compensation and Pensions account by $1 in order to allow for and draw attention to the need for provision of headstones and markers for certain members of the Armed Services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase and then decrease funds within the Veterans Benefits Administration Compensation and Pensions account by $1 in order to allow for the provision of headstones and markers for certain members of the Armed Services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hayworth amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Hayworth.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hayworth amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
